public RemoteFileTreePanel(JembossParams mysettings)

RemoteFileTreePanel

public RemoteFileTreePanel(JembossParams mysettings,
                           boolean laddCombo)
                    throws JembossSoapException
Creates a panel to contain the directory trees on an embreo server. A combobox allows the user to select which filesystem to view.

Parameters:
mysettings - JembossParams with settings information
